about.LicenseAgreement: Ukoresheje iyi software, wemera ingingo zamasezerano ya software ya Neuralium. Urashobora kureba verisiyo yanyuma yamasezerano yimpushya za software kuri:

verifyAccount.Title: Kugenzura Konti
verifyAccount.IntroductionText: Kugirango wirinde ihohoterwa, inzira yo gushiraho konti igomba kunyura muburyo bumwe bwo kugenzura. Ukurikije aho uri, amahitamo atandukanye arahari.
verifyAccount.ResultsSuccess: Igenzura ryagenze neza! konte yawe Id ubu igenzurwa na terefone.
verifyAccount.ResultsFailure: Igenzura ryatsinzwe. Urashobora kongera kugerageza mumasaha 24.
verifyAccount.DefaultHelpText: Hano ugomba guhitamo uburyo bwo kugenzura muburyo bwo guhitamo kuboneka. Buri buryo bufite ibyiza nibitagenda neza. Nyamuneka hitamo imwe ikubereye.
verifyAccount.TESTNETHelpText: Muri TESTNET, igenzura rirashobora kurengerwa kugirango uhite ukora konti ako kanya.
verifyAccount.AppointmentsHelpText: Uzatangira gahunda yo kugenzura gahunda ya Neuralium. Iyi nzira irashobora kumara iminsi myinshi kandi ugomba kuba uhari kubonana nawe mugihe itariki yemejwe. Ibyiza: anonymous.
verifyAccount.POWHelpText: Uzagomba gukora igihe gihenze CPU gihamya yakazi. Nibimara kuzura, konte yawe izashobora gucukura mu cyiciro cya 1 nicya 2 nka Serveri.

appointments.Title: Kugenzura Ishyirwaho
appointments.IntroductionText: Gahunda yo gukora igenamigambi igamije kugenzura abakoresha mugihe hagaragaye umubare munini wumwuzure utari muri sisitemu.
appointments.RequestAppointmentText: Kugirango utangire inzira, nyamuneka saba gahunda neza. Gusaba gahunda bizakorwa kandi ibyemezo bigomba kwakirwa mugihe kizaza.
appointments.AppointmentRequestedText: Washyizeho gahunda. Tugomba noneho gutegereza ibyemejwe.
appointments.AppointmentConfirmedText: Icyifuzo cyawe cyo kwemezwa cyemejwe kandi itariki yo kubonana nigihe cyagenwe. Witondere kuzitabira igihe!
appointments.AppointmentVerificationRequestedText: Icyifuzo cyo kugenzura ishyirwaho cyoherejwe. Ubu dutegereje kwemezwa.
appointments.InvalidPuzzleEngineVersion: Imashini ya puzzle yemewe. Nyamuneka vugurura verisiyo ya software.

puzzles.Title: Puzzle
puzzles.TimeBeforeAppointment: Igice cyawe cya puzzle kizatangira vuba. Igihe cyagenwe gisigaye mbere yo gutangira gahunda yawe
puzzles.WaitingForPuzzle: isomo rya puzzle rigomba gutangira umwanya uwariwo wose. Kugeza ubu dutegereje amabwiriza ya puzzle ...
puzzles.CompletedAndSend: Ibisubizo byawe byarangiye. Nyamuneka tegereza mugihe ibisubizo biri gutunganywa.
puzzles.PreparingPackage: Nyamuneka utegereze mugihe gahunda yo kubonana irangiye kandi yohereze ibisubizo byo kugenzura.

sms.Title: Kugenzura SMS
sms.ConfirmationCodeHint: Kode yemeza ushobora kuba warabonye muburyo bwo kubonana.
sms.PhoneNumberHint: Inomero ya terefone aho ushobora kwakira ubutumwa bugufi.
sms.SmsCodeHint: Kode yemeza ko wakiriye ubutumwa bwa SMS.
sms.IntroductionText: Hano tuzagenzura konte yawe dukoresheje numero ya terefone yemewe.
sms.InvalidChineseConfiguration: Mubushinwa, kubera ikibazo cyo kohereza ubutumwa bugufi, hagomba kubanza kuboneka Kode yemewe.
sms.InvalidPhoneFormat: Imiterere ya nimero ya terefone itemewe
sms.InvalidSMSCode: Imiterere ya kode ya SMS itemewe
sms.ResultsSuccess: Igenzura ryagenze neza! konte yawe Id ubu igenzurwa na terefone.
sms.ResultsFailure: Igenzura ryatsinzwe. Urashobora kongera kugerageza mumasaha 24.

accountPublication.AccountPublicationProcessExplanation: Mbere yuko ibikorwa byose bishobora gukorwa kuri blocain, konte yawe igomba kwerekanwa kubandi. Konti yawe izemezwa, kandi izaba yiteguye gukora imaze kwemezwa muri blok.
accountPublication.AccountPublicationFailed: Ikosa ryabaye mugihe cyo gutangaza konti. Gusohora byarananiranye.
accountPublication.CanCloseWindow: Urashobora noneho gufunga neza idirishya mugihe utegereje ko ibyemezo bigera.
accountPublication.NeedBlockchainSynced: Blockchain igomba guhuzwa kugirango itangaze konti.
accountPublication.NeedPeerToPublish: Ntabwo urungano ruhagije ruhujwe kugirango utangire gusohora konti.

app.PleaseEnterYourPassphraseLastAttempt: Nyamuneka andika Phassphrase yawe igerageza rya nyuma
app.PleaseCopyYourKeyFile: Nyamuneka kora urufunguzo rwawe mu gikapo cyawe.
app.TermsOfServiceCheck: Reba hano kugirango werekane ko wasomye kandi wemera amasezerano ya serivisi.
app.TermsOfServiceClick: Ukanze Yego na / cyangwa ukoresheje iyi software wemera kumasezerano ya serivisi
app.ServerRunningStop: Seriveri ya Neuralium kuri ubu iracyakora. Urashaka kubihagarika?

contact.AddContactExplanation: Ongeraho umubonano winjiza konte yabo nizina ryumukoresha.
contact.Title: Twandikire
contact.Explain: Inshuti zawe numero zabo za konte kugirango ubone vuba.

dashboard.Title: Ikibaho
dashboard.Explain: Ingingo nyamukuru yo kureba kuri blocain hamwe na konte yawe.

error.InformationsNotCorrectPleaseRetry: Amakuru ntabwo arukuri. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

history.Title: Gucuruza
history.Explain: Amateka yubucuruzi bwawe hamwe nibisobanuro bya tekiniki bijyanye nimiterere yimbere

mining.ExplainInfoPanel: Ibintu bitandukanye byingirakamaro infomation adn imibare yerekeye amasomo yawe yubucukuzi
mining.Explain: Hano urashobora gushyira mudasobwa yawe kumurimo uyikora kugirango ikore ibisubizo byimibare kugirango ufungure Neuralium nshya.
mining.Miningportalert: Icyitonderwa: Kugirango ucukure, icyambu cya TCP kigomba guhuzwa nizindi ngingo kuri p2p. Kugabana ni ikinyabupfura gikwiye kuri p2p. Niba wifuza gucukura mu cyiciro cya kabiri nicyambere cyo gucukura amabuye y'agaciro, icyambu kigomba guhuzwa bitabaye ibyo node ntizigera icukura neza. Nyamuneka wemeze gufungura firewall yawe hanyuma ushoboze kohereza icyerekezo.
mining.FirstTier: Ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro mu cyiciro cya 1
mining.SecondTier: Ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro mu cyiciro cya 2
mining.ThirdTier: Ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro mu cyiciro cya 3
mining.FourthTier: Ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro mu cyiciro cya 4
mining.ConfirmClearCachedCredentials: Ibyangombwa byo gucukura amabuye y'agaciro byakuweho? (ibi birashobora guhindura imikorere nabi kandi ntibisabwa)
mining.PortNotConnectableCantMine: Kugirango ucukure mu cyiciro cya 1 cyangwa icya 2, icyambu cya p2p kigomba guhuzwa. Ntushobora gukora ubucukuzi nkuko biri. Niba udashobora gufungura icyambu, noneho shiraho ubucukuzi kugirango ukore murwego rwa 3.

neuralium.NoTransaction: Nta transaction yabonetse kuri iki kintu cyagenwe.
neuralium.Title: Neuralium
neuralium.Explain: Ibintu byose bijyanye na Neuralium yawe kuri konte yawe

send.CantSend: Ntushobora kohereza ibikorwa. Ntabwo urungano ruhagije ruhujwe.
send.NoAccountOrAccountNotActiveOrNotPublishe: Nta konte, konte idakora cyangwa ntabwo yatangajwe
send.NotEnoughNeuraliums: Ntabwo bihagije Neuralium kugirango yuzuze ibikorwa
send.PleaseChooseContactInTheListOrInputConta: Nyamuneka hitamo kuvugana kurutonde cyangwa kwinjiza id
send.PleaseInputNeuraliumAmount: Nyamuneka andika neza umubare wa Neuralium
send.Title: Ohereza
send.TransactionError: Ikosa ryabayeho kohereza ibicuruzwa. Kode y'amakosa:
send.PresentationAccountId: Ntushobora kohereza ibimenyetso kuri konte yo kwerekana Id
send.NotesDescription: Inyandiko idahwitse izabikwa mubitabo byawe gusa.

server.CheckingServer: Nyamuneka tegereza mugihe tugenzura niba seriveri ikora ibaho ...
server.Title: Seriveri
server.Explain: Idirishya kubakoresha bateye imbere ryemerera gucunga Neuralium node seriveri.

settings.Title: Igenamiterere
settings.Explain: Amahitamo atandukanye urashobora gushiraho kugirango urangize ikotomoni yawe.

tools.Title: Ibikoresho
tools.Explain: Ibikoresho byingirakamaro bigufasha kunoza uburambe bwa Neuralium.

testMode.ParagrahOne: Ubu uri muburyo bwa TESTNET. Verisiyo ya testnet igenewe kugerageza nibintu bishya bishobora cyangwa bidashobora gukora nkuko byateganijwe. Urashobora kumenyesha amakosa yose, ibibazo cyangwa ibyifuzo ushobora kuba ufite kubisubizo byabigenewe.
testMode.ParagrahTwo: Muburyo bwa TESTNET, ibimenyetso byose bya neuralium byungutse ni kubigerageza gusa kandi ntibishobora gukoreshwa mubikorwa bya 'MainNet'. Tokens yungutse muburyo bwa TESTNET irashobora kandi gutakara cyangwa gusubiramo igihe icyo aricyo cyose utabanje kubimenyeshwa.
testMode.Warning: Urupapuro hamwe nu gikapo biri muri TestNet Mode kumurongo utandukanye.
testMode.Period: Iyi TESTNET yubaka ifite agaciro kugeza 18 Kanama 2020.

wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfAllKeys: a Phassphrase yo kugenzura urufunguzo rwose
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorSecret: a Phassphrase yo kugenzura super Urufunguzo
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorVerifi: a Phassphrase yo kugenzura super Urufunguzo
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfBackupKey: a Phassphrase yo kugenzura super Urufunguzo
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfMessageKey: a Phassphrase yo kugenzura ubutumwa Urufunguzo
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfTransactionKey: a Phassphrase yo gushishoza Urufunguzo rwo Gucuruza
wallet.PleaseCreateOrCopy: Kora ikotomoni nshya cyangwa wohereze iyariho.
wallet.WalletWaitMessage: Ubu turimo gukora konte yawe nurufunguzo rwumutekano. Ibi birashobora gufata iminota myinshi. Urakoze kwihangana kwawe.
wallet.Completed: Umufuka wawe wakozwe neza. Noneho nkintambwe ikurikira, turagusaba cyane ko wakora backup kumutekano wububiko bwawe bwose. Turagusaba kandi cyane ko ukuraho urufunguzo rwa super mububiko bwa konte yawe hanyuma ukabika neza kuri disiki hanze ya mudasobwa yawe.
wallet.WalletPath: Urashobora kumenya ikotomoni yawe nshya munzira ikurikira
